featured.text: Under the _____ of newly elected president Barack Obama, the US is expected to turn a new page in politics and economy.
All three _____ seem confident that they will be elected, but we won’t know until the outcome of the election is announced.

definition.zh_def: 選擇或投票以決定某人或某事。
definition.en_def: To choose or vote for someone or something.
definition.example: We will elect a new president next month.
